A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A well made film to a terrible script that forsaken everything that made Star Wars great. Butchered Luke’s and the original films storylines in favor of political correctness agenda and uncharismatic characters. Long\, uneven by tone\, and overstuffed. Despite strong performance by Hamill it single handedly ruined the Star Wars saga\, and with amount of damage it caused\, it’ll be hard to Impossible to fix in future sequels.
